title:
Rotation effect for chiral magnetic cosmic string in the Kaluza-Klein
  theory
authors:
Ricardo L. L. Vit\'oria, Carlos F. S. Pereira, \'Erico V. B. Leite,
  Adriano R. Soares, Humberto Belich
abstract:
We have investigated bound state solutions for a scalar particle described in
the spacetime of a chiral cosmic string subjected to rotational effects in a
Kaluza-Klein theory. We saw that combinations between the parameters that
describe the generalized spacetime impose upper and lower limits for the radial
coordinate leading to well-established boundary conditions.
